tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name STRING,
  gender STRING,
  age INT,
  diagnosis STRING,
  exacerbations_count INT,
  complications_count INT,
  admitted BOOLEAN)

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    disease_status VARCHAR(20),
    time_of_diagnosis TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE MLModel (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    training_data_schema VARCHAR(50),
    result_metric VARCHAR(30),
    last_trained_on TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PatientData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR(10),
  temperature FLOAT,
  oxygen_level FLOAT,
  record_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE MLModels (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(50),
  algorithm VARCHAR(50),
  accuracy FLOAT,
  trained_on_data_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR(50),
 age INT,
 disease_history VARCHAR(100),
 exacerbation_history VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE patient_vitals (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 heart_rate INT,
 blood_pressure VARCHAR(10),
 respiratory_rate INT);

CREATE TABLE machine_learning_model (model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 model_name VARCHAR(50),
 hyperparameters VARCHAR(100),
 accuracy FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE exacerbation_prediction (prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 exacerbation_probability FLOAT,
 prediction_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(50),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    admission_date TIMESTAMP,
    discharge_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE vitals (
    vital_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(50),
    temperature DECIMAL,
    oxygen_level DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE lab_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    test_name VARCHAR(100),
    value DECIMAL,
    unit VARCHAR(50),
    date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE medications (
    medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    medication_name VARCHAR(100),
    dosage DECIMAL,
    frequency VARCHAR(50),
    start_date TIMESTAMP,
    end_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE exacerbation_predictions (
    prediction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    prediction_date TIMESTAMP,
    predicted_exacerbation BOOLEAN,
    confidence DECIMAL
);
